chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: This is a download from BBC Learning English.To find out more, visit our website.

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: In this 6 Minute English, we'll be hearing about an unusual library, where the books are people, made of flesh and bone instead of paper. It's called the human library, and the books are individuals who have faced prejudice, which means an unreasonable dislike of certain types of people.

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: The human books are volunteers and visiting readers are encouraged to ask those awkward or embarrassing questions they've always wondered about.It's a fascinating idea, but before we find out more, I have a question for you, Sam.

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: Well, everyone likes to hear a story, so I'll guess C, 95.OK, Sam, we'll find out if that's right later in the programme.

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: We don't have time on the street to stop and get to know everyone, so we drop people in little boxes.So it's instinct that's guiding us, and we never get beyond the instinct if we don't get to know the person.So at our library, we recommend sitting down and meeting some of the people that you normally might actually not feel interested in sitting down with because there's something about them that you may

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: feel a little bit uncomfortable about.You'll learn tremendously not only about them, but also about yourself.

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: So the main idea of the human library

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: 正確的 它是每個人的慶祝 無論是性 年齡 或者性的慶祝或者民族的慶祝 這讓我想起了你問的答案是什麼 尼爾哦 是的 我問你今天有多少個國家有一個人類書館 你說什麼 薩姆我猜是C 95個國家

chunks.episode_title: The Human Library_ Life as an open book
chunks.chunk_text: 我怕是錯誤的答案 正確的答案是B 85個國家 從紐約和香港 到澳大利亞和蒙古利亞哇 我知道這有很多有趣的故事好 讓我們把這個節目的詞據 描繪一下 關於人們在遇到危險的情況下 分享了他們的經歷一個安全的空間是一個地方 讓人們感到安全和危險
